lead_paragraph: Matt Joyce hopes to play more regularly again in his new role with the Oakland Athletics, who needed a new outfielder to fill a big void and put him high on their offseason list.

headline.print_headline: Outfielder Matt Joyce Agrees to $11M, 2-Year Deal With A's
headline.main: Outfielder Matt Joyce Agrees to $11M, 2-Year Deal With A's

snippet: Matt Joyce hopes to play more regularly again in his new role with the Oakland Athletics, who needed a new outfielder to fill a big void and put him high on their offseason list....
